overview: Hollywood Hogan defends the WCW World Heavyweight Championship against "The Macho Man" Randy Savage. The Outsiders face Harlem Heat for the WCW World Tag Team Championship. "The Total Package" Lex Luger takes on "The Enforcer" Arn Anderson. Dean Malenko takes on Rey Misterio Jr. for the WCW Cruiserweight Championship and much more!
tagline: A Night of Terror and Suspense!
title: WCW Halloween Havoc 1996
